defs: a bold, brave man.
a bold, brave woman.

the sixth tone or note in the ascending scale of both Karnāṭaka and Hindūstāni systems of music.
immediately; suddenly.
a natural pond on a hill or mountain.
an artificial pool or pond used for water storage; a water-tank.
a place that is depressed in position compared to the places surrounding it; a hollow or low place.
with a heavy sound as made by something bulky while falling down suddenly.
to fall down suddenly with a heavy sound.
a male ruler of a nation or state usu. called a kingdom; a king; a ruler; a monarch.
a term used in addressing one's superior, administrator or ruler.
a term of endearment used in addressing children.
ability; capability.
competence; worthiness.
the quality of excelling; excellence; superiority.
a grand, majestic worshipping of a deity.
deep trouble or misery.
the use of false representations to gain an unjust advantage; a dishonest artifice or trick; criminal deception.

a long, unsewn cloth worn by men around the waist covering upto the ankles, sometimes, one end of which is passed between the thighs and tucked in behind at the waist.
a loose garment for covering the shoulder or shoulders.

a man who washes clothes, linens, etc., for hire; laundryman.
a caste the main profession of the members of which is washing clothes.
a member of this caste.
a large kettle-drum.
any vehicle.
a kind of gait of a horse.
the act of a person or thing that runs; a running or galloping.
the object to be attained; intention; purpose; aim.
a particular disposition or bent of mind; bias; tendency; inclination.
the style of a composition.
a manner of acting, feeling or thinking that shows one's disposition, opinion, etc., attitude.
one's disposition, opinion, mental set, view, etc.; a stand.
the manner in which one behaves, acts; behavior.
the quality characterised by dignity, self-importance, arrogance, conceit or pomp.
(fig.) lack of concern, interest or feeling; apathy; indifference.
cleansed; clean; washed.
white; shining; lustrous.
a thing that is clean, washed (as clothes).
the quality of being white; whiteness.

a white metallic element that is sonorous, ductile, very malleable, capable of a high degree of polish, and chiefly univalent in compounds, and that has the highest thermal and electric conductivity of any substance; silver; (Ag.).
that which is sharpened (as a weapon).
(yoga.) a yogic cleansing, in which a narrow, long piece of clean cloth is taken into stomach and taken our from the anus.
a running by hopping, a kind of gait of a horse.
a draft-animal.
a responsible man.
a horse.

profound and abstract religious meditation.
observant care; consideration; attention.

a conception of something in its most excellent or perfect form; an ideal.

achievement of this.

(mus.) a kind of song, sung in Hindūstāni system, in which a phrase or a line of a verse is repeated with systematic, elaborate elongation of the mode using different phrases of notes that are particular to the rāga (musical mode).
not moving; unchangeable; firm; fixed; constant.
not to be doubted; certain.
permanent; eternal.
that which is eternal.

a slightly variable, super giant, binary star, the brightest star in the constellation Ursa Minor, with a magnitude of 2.1, used as a guide for navigation, since it is the closest star to the north; North Star; Pole Star; Polaris.
a mythological man personifying this star.
one of a class of deities (known as Vasus, eight in number) who are the attendants upon Indra, the chief of gods.
either end of any axis, as of the earth, of the celestial sphere, of a mitotic spindle during cell division, etc.; a pole.
either of two ends of a magnet, opposed to each other; a magnetic pole.
either of two opposed or extremes of opinion.
a length of wood pointed at one end which is driven into the ground, for tying or supporting something; a stake.
the lower portion of a tree, above the ground, trimmed by cutting off branches.
a wooden roller used in an oil mill.
(astrol.) a particular combination of astrological planets.
(mus.) a cycle of time that has fourteen units (4+2+4+4).
a variety of musical composition.
the first verse of a song that is repeated at the end of each of the following verses.
a spot on the skin of a horse where hair is curled.
the tip of one's nose.
the unchangeable or eternal state.
water (or source of water) that never gets dried.
2.(fig.) a most excellent or idealistic person who remains to be an example for ever.
(fig.) a standard of perfection or excellence; an ideal.
the quality, state or fact of being eternal; eternal existence or duration; continuance without end; eternity.

an amount of money kept as a permanent deposit, usu. for earning interest to be used for an ideal cause.
a long-lasting plant (as coconut or arecanut tree).

death, as an inevitable and inescapable happening in one's life.

a permanent endowment of a land or village, that is free from being taxed.
either of the two imaginary circles parallel to the equator being c. 66º 34' south or north of it.
the region around either South or North Pole; the Antarctica or Arctic.
the producing of polarity in something or the acquiring of polarity; polarisation.
the condition of electromagnetic or other waves in which the transverse motion or field of the wave is confined to one plane or one direction; polarisation.

of, relating to, near, coming from the region near the North or South pole; polar.

having polarity.

the having or showing of contrary qualities, powers, tendencies, forms, etc. as the two electrodes of a battery, etc.; polarity.
the condition of being positive or negative with respect to some reference point or object, as electricity; polarity.

fixedness; firmness; immovableness.
the quality, state or fact of being eternal; eternity.

the organ of copulation and of urinary excretion in men; the penis.
a foretelling the prosperity of a person living in a house, based on the remainder got by dividing the area of the site of the building by 8.

Ādiśeṣa, the king of serpents; ನಂಜು ಕಾರು nanju kāru to feel or show envious resentment, strong dislike; ನಂಜು ನುಡಿ1 nanju nuḍi to speak enviously; to show one's resentful dislike; ನಂಜು ನುಡಿ2 nanju nuḍi envious or resentful words or speech.

ನಂಬಿಕೆ ಮೂಡಿಸು nambike mūḍisu = ನಂಬಿಕೆ ಹುಟ್ಟಿಸು; ನಂಬಿಕೆ ಮೂಡು nambike mūḍu = ನಂಬಿಕೆ ಹುಟ್ಟು; ನಂಬಿಕೆ ಹುಟ್ಟಿಸು nambike huṭṭisu to make another trust or believe; 2. to cause to have faith; ನಂಬಿಕೆ ಹುಟ್ಟು nambike huṭṭu (trust, belief) to be formed in one's mind; 2. (faith) to be formed in one's mind.
